title: Gannets of Bonaventure Island
creator_credit: Dan Gibson, Sidney Goldsmith and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This film takes us to Bonaventure Island off the coast of Quebec, to visit a gannet colony. The social life, nesting, laying, incubation and flying of the gannets is shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Dan Gibson, Sidney Goldsmith and National Film Board of Canada
